body:
YaC
===

YaC 2012: Core Animation Sample Code

Here you can obtain sample code for the Core Animation tech talk (Yet Another Conference 2012).

***

This repository contains the following samples:
* Updating UIToolbar with the cube animation
* Stretching UIScrollView
* Springboard transition example
* Gestured Transitions: fold, shredder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: YaC 2012: Core Animation
